item.title: Reading Response to Algebra and Its Unifying Role
Project Archive
item.description:
Selected Projects

This page showcases a selection of recent design work, research, and experimental studies in architecture, fabrication, and spatial media.

item.title: Reading response to “Interactive Fabrication”

item.title: Medium Design, Keller Easterling
item.description: In Medium Design, Keller Easterling argued for tacit knowledge, and affordance, which constantly interact with a hand.
